attributes.background: I love fireworks,  like most of the UK, it is a symbol of our long heritage.  But animals suffer with the noise.  Can we petition for colour only fireworks without the bang, and look after our pets and wildlife.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make it illegal to sell, buy and use fireworks other than silent ones
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
